description: This operation returns a list of recovery points that have an associated index, belonging to the specified account. Optional parameters you can include are: MaxResults; NextToken; SourceResourceArns; CreatedBefore; CreatedAfter; and ResourceType.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The next item following a partial list of returned recovery points. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of indexed recovery points, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Returns a list of indexed recovery points for the specified resource type(s). Accepted values include: EBS for Amazon Elastic Block Store S3 for Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3)

parameters.name: IndexStatus
parameters.description: Include this parameter to filter the returned list by the indicated statuses. Accepted values: PENDING | ACTIVE | FAILED | DELETING A recovery point with an index that has the status of ACTIVE can be included in a search.

nested_items.name: IndexedRecoveryPoints
nested_items.description: This is a list of recovery points that have an associated index, belonging to the specified account.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45

nested_items.name: SourceResourceArn
nested_items.description: A string of the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the source resource.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: This specifies the IAM role ARN used for this operation.

nested_items.name: BackupCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup was created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the indexed recovery point.
EBS for Amazon Elastic Block Store.
S3 for Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3)

nested_items.name: IndexCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup index was created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: IndexStatus
nested_items.description: This is the current status for the backup index associated with the specified recovery point.

nested_items.name: IndexStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A string in the form of a detailed message explaining the status of a backup index associated with the recovery point.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies the backup vault where the recovery point index is stored.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned recovery points.
